name: Los Toros Monos
description:
Help Arbusto de Pato sneak through a building to get to the secret headquarters of his gang, Los Toros Monos, so they can plan a wretched plot. 🔥

They have gathered to plot their conspiracy, of which there is no current knowledge by the FBI or local Police forces (except for the fact that Los Toros Monos are creating it, so it probably has something to do with grass and bananas.)

This game has three endings! Can you find them all? 🕵️

Made completely solo in two weeks for the Ms. Paint Jam in 2022. 🎨👩‍🎨

Controls:
  • Standard WASD movement 👟
  • R to restart
  • That's it. Nothin' but keyboard ⌨️
